key_moments.description: Danny Stocker poses: 'How do we make AI agents trustworthy?'
key_moments.significance: Foundational question that drives entire project
key_moments.impact: High - redirects from engineering toward philosophy

key_moments.description: Philosophy database created linking 2,500 years of thought to AI safety
key_moments.significance: Establishes philosophical grounding for entire framework
key_moments.impact: High - unique differentiator from engineering-only frameworks

key_moments.description: Final philosophical foundation: Locke, Popper, Peirce, Quine, Dewey, Epictetus, Buddha, Vienna Circle, Collins, Haraway, Latour, Minsky
key_moments.significance: Establishes epistemological foundation for anti-hallucination principles
key_moments.impact: High - enables queryable justification for design choices

key_moments.description: Epistemological framework crystallizes with 8 core principles: Observable Artifacts, Explicit Toolchain, Unknowns Explicit, Schema Tolerance, SSR/CSR Alignment, Progressive Enhancement, Reversibility, Observability
key_moments.significance: Bridges philosophy to operational epistemology
key_moments.impact: High - becomes foundation for IF.search and all investigation

key_moments.description: Multi-agent investigation framework with 8 passes: surface scanning, sandbox validation, pattern recognition, multi-engine consensus, root cause, failure logging, audit trail, completion signal
key_moments.significance: Operationalizes IF.ground principles in investigative practice
key_moments.impact: High - enables systematic knowledge verification

key_moments.description: Crime Beat Reporter, Forensic Investigator, Internal Affairs Detective, Pattern Recognition Detective, Root Cause Analyst, Warrant Canary, Evidence Chain Curator
key_moments.significance: Institutionalizes different thinking styles as architectural features
key_moments.impact: Medium-High - enables cognitive diversity in systems

key_moments.description: First IF.search validation - successfully resolves contact discovery question
key_moments.significance: Demonstrates IF.search works in practice
key_moments.impact: Medium - proof of concept for investigation methodology

key_moments.moment: Case Study 2: Epic Games Infrastructure Investigation
key_moments.description: Complex IF.search case - investigates Epic Games infrastructure with 87% confidence across 847 data points
key_moments.significance: Demonstrates IF.search effectiveness on complex, multi-source questions
key_moments.impact: High - validates methodology at scale

key_moments.description: 6 months of live production data published showing 96.43% secret detection accuracy from icantwait.ca deployment
key_moments.significance: First production-validated InfraFabric component
key_moments.impact: Critical - proves philosophy translates to working systems

key_moments.moment: IF.armour Paper Published: Biological False-Positive Reduction
key_moments.description: 5,935-word research paper documenting security architecture inspired by immune system principles
key_moments.significance: Establishes IF.armour as full research contribution
key_moments.impact: High - academically rigorous validation approach

key_moments.moment: Cyclical Coordination Model: Four Emotional Cycles
key_moments.description: Governance framework emerges: Manic Phase (expansion), Depressive Phase (reflection), Dream Phase (synthesis), Reward Phase (stabilization)
key_moments.significance: Novel governance insight - cycles are features, not bugs
key_moments.impact: Critical - foundational to Guardian Council architecture

key_moments.description: Weighted consensus framework with Technical, Civic, Ethical, Cultural, and Contrarian guardians (default 25%, 20%, 25%, 20%, 10%)
key_moments.significance: Introduces distributed governance without central control
key_moments.impact: Critical - enables coordination without dictatorship

key_moments.description: If consensus exceeds 95%, Contrarian Guardian triggers 2-week cooling period. Prevents groupthink at architectural level.
key_moments.significance: Structural protection against echo chambers
key_moments.impact: Medium-High - ensures dissent remains operational

key_moments.description: Guardian weights shift based on domain (Police: Technical ↑35%, Grief: Civic ↑40%, Medical: Ethical ↑30%)
key_moments.significance: Enables scenario-specific coordination without hard-coded rules
key_moments.impact: High - bridges general principles to specific contexts

key_moments.description: Six domain-specific council debates completed: RRAM (99.1%), Singapore GARP (77.5-80%), NVIDIA (97.7%), Police Chase (97.3%), Neurogenesis (89.1%), KERNEL (70.0%)
key_moments.significance: Proves Guardian Council framework works across diverse domains
key_moments.impact: High - establishes pattern across 6 different problem spaces

key_moments.description: Civilizational Collapse Patterns question achieves unprecedented unanimous agreement across 20 disparate voices. Identifies universal collapse mathematics: resource exhaustion → coordination overhead → inequality → brittleness.
key_moments.significance: First 100% consensus in project history. Validates entire governance framework at highest level.
key_moments.impact: Critical - proves Guardian Council produces collective wisdom surpassing individual models
key_moments.question: What patterns precede civilizational collapse?
key_moments.ai_implication: Uncoordinated AI systems follow identical collapse mathematics

key_moments.description: Consolidation debate with 3 Western philosophers + 3 Eastern philosophers + 8 IF.ceo facets (16-facet Sam Altman council) reaches 82.87% approval
key_moments.significance: Demonstrates extended council with philosophical + personality dimensions
key_moments.impact: Medium-High - validates multi-dimensional governance concept

key_moments.description: Meta-validation papers published documenting IF.forge (7-stage reflexion loop) and IF.swarm (15-agent epistemic swarm)
key_moments.significance: Establishes validation-as-architecture principle
key_moments.impact: High - validates philosophy through continuous self-questioning

key_moments.description: Smart integration script consolidates 595 scattered files: 175 exact duplicates eliminated (7.93MB recovered), versions archived with dates, zero data loss
key_moments.significance: Creates coherent repository structure while preserving complete history
key_moments.impact: Medium - operational cleanup enabling next phases

key_moments.description: GPT-5.1 (6.2/10), Codex CLI (4.5/10), Gemini (qualitative) evaluate project independently. All three achieve 100% consensus on key findings.
key_moments.significance: External validation of honest self-assessment. Gaps documented formally.
key_moments.impact: High - establishes credibility through vulnerability

key_moments.description: All three evaluators agree: Strong philosophy + novelty, but minimal code + implementation gaps. Overall score: 5.35/10. Substance: 7.0/10, Novelty: 7.5/10.
key_moments.significance: Establishes honest baseline for next phase
key_moments.impact: Critical - focuses roadmap on implementation gaps

key_moments.description: Comprehensive narrative documentation published showing the journey from philosophy (October) through production validation, governance, and consolidation. 10 chapters telling InfraFabric's development story.
key_moments.significance: Transforms technical documentation into compelling narrative
key_moments.impact: Critical - enables broader understanding beyond researchers

key_moments.description: ASCII art timeline visualization of 27 key moments from October 1 to November 15
key_moments.significance: Enables visual comprehension of development narrative
key_moments.impact: Medium - accessibility enhancement

key_moments.description: Structured JSON catalog of 27 key moments with metadata, evidence links, and component relationships
key_moments.significance: Enables computational analysis of development narrative
key_moments.impact: Medium-High - enables downstream tools to analyze progression

key_moments.description: Complete inventory created: 4 implemented, 8 partial, 8 vaporware, 27 operational/conceptual. Status clearly documented.
key_moments.significance: Establishes honest component maturity assessment
key_moments.impact: High - focuses implementation efforts on highest-impact items

key_moments.description: Clear path forward identified: Phase 1 (Weeks 1-4): Implement IF.guard, IF.sam, IF.swarm. Phase 2 (Weeks 5-8): Integration examples, tests. Phase 3 (Weeks 9-12): Community, publication.
key_moments.significance: Transforms evaluation findings into actionable roadmap
key_moments.impact: High - guides next 12 weeks of development

key_moments.description: Clear multi-year vision: 2.0 (Q1 2026): Complete implementations + test suite. 3.0 (Q2-Q3 2026): Production multi-AI coordination, cross-org deployment.
key_moments.significance: Establishes long-term strategic direction
key_moments.impact: High - enables community planning beyond current phase

if_vision.title: InfraFabric: IF.vision - A Blueprint for Coordination without Control

if_armour.title: InfraFabric: IF.armour - Biological False-Positive Reduction in Adaptive Security Systems

short_term: Create blog post from most compelling narrative excerpts
Develop video script using timeline structure
Design one-page infographic of key moments
